mapper.select: SELECT t.sign_no signNo , t.total_grade totalGrade , t.grade_total gradeTotal , t.grade_rank gradeRank , t.grade_test gradeTest , t.grade_att gradeAtt , t.grade_paper gradePaper , s.user_id userId from totalgrade t inner JOIN sign s ON t.sign_no = s.sign_no WHERE s.lecture_no = 1
SELECT COUNT(q.question_no) questionCnt FROM question q INNER JOIN test t ON q.test_no = t.test_no INNER JOIN lecture l ON t.lecture_no = l.lecture_no WHERE t.lecture_no = #{lectureNo}

SELECT SUM(a.answer_score)/#{questionCnt}*100 score , COUNT(q.question_no) questionCnt , COUNT(a.answer_score) scoreCnt FROM answer a INNER JOIN question q ON a.question_no = q.question_no INNER JOIN test t ON q.test_no = t.test_no INNER JOIN sign s ON s.sign_no = a.sign_no WHERE t.lecture_no = #{lectureNo} AND s.sign_no = #{signNo}

SELECT t.sign_no , s.lecture_no , t.grade_total , @RANK:= IF( @LAST > grade_total , @RANK := @RANK + 1 , @RANK ) AS RANK , @LAST := grade_total AS totalgrade , @RANK / (SELECT COUNT(sign_no) FROM sign WHERE lecture_no = 1) * 100 AS persent , (SELECT case when persent <= 10 then 4.5 when persent <= 25 then 4.0 when persent <= 45 then 3.5 when persent <= 85 then 3.0 when persent <= 95 then 2.5 when persent <= 100 then 2.0 END ) POINT FROM totalgrade t INNER JOIN sign s ON s.sign_no = t.sign_no ,(SELECT @RANK := 1) xx WHERE s.lecture_no = 1 ORDER BY grade_total desc

SELECT sb.subject_name , u.user_name , t.sign_no signNo , t.total_grade totalGrade , t.grade_total gradeTotal , t.grade_rank gradeRank , t.grade_test gradeTest , t.grade_att gradeAtt , t.grade_paper gradePaper FROM totalgrade t INNER JOIN sign s on t.sign_no = s.sign_no INNER JOIN user u ON u.user_id = s.user_id INNER JOIN lecture l ON s.lecture_no = l.lecture_no INNER JOIN subject sb ON l.subject_no = sb.subject_no WHERE s.user_id = 'tt' AND s.lecture_no = 1
